items.sentence: You have friends who can help you, don\'t you?
Do you know where Tom bought his new computer?
It isn\'t hard to see why you don\'t like Tom.
I rarely go to the mall, but I went yesterday.
I read two books last week. I loved them both.
Tom tries to write a new blog entry every day.
Tom turned off the lights and closed the door.
I\'m sorry, Tom. I\'m afraid I can\'t do that.
Tom heard a rumor that Mary had been arrested.
Tom honked the horn and leaned out the window.
Tom hung out in a bar with Mary all afternoon.
Tom hurried down the stairs with his suitcase.
Tom hurried to get the horses out of the barn.
I assume you\'ve heard about Tom\'s promotion.
Three of Tom\'s friends went to Mary\'s party.
You\'re a lot taller than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re almost as tall as Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re doing that the wrong way, aren\'t you?
You\'re expected to do that, too, aren\'t you?
The police questioned Tom\'s girlfriend, Mary.
